directions: Season the chicken well and bake 30 minutes at 350 degrees F.
Cook the pasta according to the directions.
Cook the bacon hard and crumble it.
ingredients: 3 chicken breasts, seasoned with Mexican blend or Fajita seasoning
1/2 pound of bacon, cooked and crumbled
12 ounce package Wacky Mac Veggie Spirals Pasta
1 teaspoon Mexican blend or Fajita seasoning
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese or Mexican blend
title: Easy Pasta Salad-Southwestern Chicken
